titleStmt.title: The Parliaments censvre on Sir Richard Gvrney, Lord Major of the honourable city of London, August 12, 1642 with the articles of his impeachment, wherein he stood charged of many offences, crimes and high misdemeanors committed by the said Sir Richard Gurney during the time of his majoralty.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
